@Benenya:  Rather than complaining in a rather abusive way, try to remember this:  Someone else has gone to the effort of putting this up for other people to download, you on the other hand are getting a FREE tv show.  Next time, feel free to upload your own version (which you have never done) or STFU and enjoy.

@Tuckle, it being free or automated is not an excuse. If it is bad/broken/incomplete/etc., then they should not upload it at all. People are right to complain that they just wasted their bandwidth on it; not everybody has free, unlimited bandwidth! If the releasers won't/can't check their stuff, then they should quit and leave it to someone who can and does instead of tricking people into wasting their bandwidth on it and polluting the search results.
